title: Cyprus potato salad
ingredients: ['4 large Cypriot potatoes, scrubbed and diced', '1 large onion, halved and thinly sliced', '2 cloves garlic, sliced', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '400g tin chopped tomatoes', 'sea salt and black pepper', '1 bunch fresh oregano or flat leaf parsley', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '250g baby spinach', '100g feta cheese']
